choices: A human, magically transported to Zootopia
One of the many animals living in Zootopia
A starry-eyed animal hoping to find a new life in the city
A cynical animal looking to find their way out of the city
Or you are someone completely different
1.content:
There are tales that have been told for many centuries of many legendary cities, Zion, Atlantis, Rapture, these are
only a handful of legendary stories passed down from generation to generation.
However in this story, there is a world out there that is completely devoid of humanity, save for the sentient beings that live there, but they are far from human, this is a city populated entirely by animals, a city called:
Zootopia


Zootopia is a wonderful place where animals of all shapes, sizes and creeds coexist in peace. Some would call Zootopia a paradise, others would say that it is a way of life, others still would say that Zootopia is just a dream, that no matter how hard you try, Zootopia is far from a paradise. However our story has not properly begun, it cannot be told without a main character, this is where you come in.

You will decide who you are, what you are, what you will do, where you will go, the power rests on your shoulders. The only question remains; Who are you?

**IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ**


Before you are five choices of great power, they will shape the way that you read the story and enjoy the numerous scenarios within.
You can choose to shape your character, Max, in any way you desire. For the Character Creation element of the story to work, I have a few ground rules that I encourage all who contribute to follow.

1. When choosing Max's characterization, please label your chapter "Character Creation" Followed by a title

2. I am not crazy about "Choice Chapters" in any interactive, they seldom contribute to the story and they artificially inflate the chapter count of the story. However, this is a story in which choices will shape who and what Max is and where they will go so "Choice Chapters" are inevitable. I ask that choice chapters are used to continue the story. I ask that you provide at least two well written sentences, relevant to the story, either as the storyteller or the character are provided.

If this proves too daunting, please contact me and I will work with you and further explain what I want.

Enjoy and Welcome to Zootopia Adventures!
1.title: Welcome to the City

11.content:
You are Max.

The story we are about to share in is your own, you make the choices and call the shots.

         Your name is Max, you are a human living in our world. Together we will set out to discover how you become involved with the world of Zootopia, but the first question in our journey is: Where do you live?
11.title: Character Creation: Where do you live?

info.brief_description: You are a citizen in the crazy metropolis that is know as, Zootopia!
info.description:
To commemorate my 13th account anniversary on March 3rd and the 4th anniversary of Zootopia's theatrical release, I present:

Zootopia Adventures


In this interactive, you will experience life in the big city of Zootopia as Max. Who is Max? That's for you to decide, Are they the tallest giraffe or the tiniest mouse? The possibilities are endless.

Rules:
1. No graphic or sexual content (Death, Fetishes, anything of that nature is a no go)
2. Romance is allowed, but keep it in accordance with rule 1
3. No cursing. This story is for all ages.
4. Keep this as G as possible, nothing past PG, please.
5. Have fun!

Thanks for adding to this interactive, I can't wait to get started on a brand new interactive!

Anyone 18+ looking for a more adult themed Zootopia, Stay tuned ;).
